name: Olympus Rise
description:
Olympus Rise is a Platformer set in ancient greece.

You play as the chosen torchbearer. Your goal is to keep the sacred torchlight alive and reach Mount Olympus to ignite the holy fire! Coming into contact with water will diminish your flame rapidly, but it will mystically replenish when out of danger. Light the waypoints along your journey to divine destiny!

Controllers are supported.
